name: The Grand Cattle Heist
description:
The Grand Cattle Heist

This short game was made in March and April 2021 for the Armory 3D Community Game Jam. It is playable on Windows.

How to play

You are the pilot of a UFO of very hungry aliens. Your goal is to steal all the cows without getting caught by the humans.

Humans will spot you if you fly too close to houses or to cars or when the sun rises (6:00 AM). The time is displayed at the top right of the screen.

  • People in houses are asleep and it takes a while until you are spotted.
  • People in cars will see you much faster, so be aware of them!

If you turn off the UFO's light beam, you can't be seen from humans, but without the light beam you won't be able to steal cows.

Key bindings
  • W/A/S/D: move the UFO
  • Shift: fly faster
  • Spacebar: toggle the light beam
